PROJECT WORK  
 
Title:  “vacuum  paddle refrigerator ” 
 
Description:  The objective of the project is to introduce a new type of technology using,  water 
and zeolite as refrigerant and absorber  respectively . it works on a very basic principle that water 
boils at 100˚c  when th e pressure  is 1 bar.  Reducing pressure , water starts boiling at room 
temperature  eventually  heat is removed from the evapora tor in the form of vapour.
